remarks: Convergence of a sequence of complex numbers.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jan-2014.)
statement:
climi.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climi.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climi.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
climi.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = B ) $.
climi.5 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climi $p |- ( ph -> E. j e. Z A. k e. ( ZZ>= ` j ) ( B e. CC /\ ( abs ` ( B - A ) ) < C ) ) $.
$d A j k $.
$d C j k $.
$d F j k $.
$d M j $.
$d Z j k $.
$d j k ph $.
